question: a $ 72.95 lawn chair was sold for $ 59.95 at a special sale . by approximately what percent was the price decreased ?
two trains of length 160 m and 320 m are running towards each other on parallel lines at 42 kmph and 30 kmph respectively . in what time will they be clear of each other from the moment they meet ?

of the 120 passengers on flight 750 , 30 % are female . 10 % of the passengers sit in first class , and the rest of the passengers sit in coach class . if 1 / 3 of the passengers in first class are male , how many females are there in coach class ?

in a certain town , the ratio of ny yankees fans to ny mets fans is 3 : 2 , and the ratio of ny mets fans to boston red sox fans is 4 : 5 . if there are 390 baseball fans in the town , each of whom is a fan of exactly one of those three teams , how many ny mets fans are there in this town ?

in a house , there are 4 birds , 3 dogs , and 18 cats living with the human family . if the total number of feet in the house are 74 more than the number of heads in the house , how many family members are there ?
what is the smallest positive integer nn such that √ 6,480 ∗ n is a perfect cube ?
if 5 is one solution of the equation x ^ 2 + 3 x + k = 10 , where k is a constant , what is the other solution ?
225 , or 15 ^ 2 , is the first perfect square that begins with two 2 s . what is the sum of the digits of the next perfect square to begin with two 2 s ?
what is the least value of x , so that 2 x 4472 is divisible by 9

in a fuel station the service costs $ 1.75 per car , every liter of fuel costs 0.45 $ . assuming that a company owns 12 cars and that every fuel tank contains 55 liters and they are all empty , how much money total will it cost to fuel all cars ?

a train sets off at 9 : 00 am at the speed of 70 km / h . another train starts at 10 : 30 am in the same direction at the rate of 80 km / h . at what time will the second train catch the first train ?
given two sets a = { 11 , 44 , 55 } and b = { 01 } , if one number is chosen from each set at random , what is the probability that the sum of both numbers is an even number
a certain meter records voltage between 0 and 10 volts inclusive . if the average value of 3 recordings on the meter was 9 volts , what was the smallest possible recording in volts ?
if 10 litres of an oil of rs . 50 per litres be mixed with 5 litres of another oil of rs . 68 per litre then what is the rate of mixed oil per litre ?
a certain number of men can do a work in 20 days . if there were 4 men less it could be finished in 5 days more . how many men are there ?
a man can row upstream at 25 kmph and downstream at 65 kmph , and then find the speed of the man in still water ?

at a certain bowling alley , it costs $ 0.50 to rent bowling shoes for the day and $ 2 to bowl 1 game . if a person has $ 12.80 and must rent shoes , what is the greatest number of complete games that person can bowl in one day ?
calculate the ratio between x and y if 15 % of x equal to 50 % of y ?
given f ( x ) = 3 x – 5 , for what value of x does 2 * [ f ( x ) ] – 1 = f ( 3 x – 6 )

the guests at a football banquet consumed a total of 411 pounds of food . if no individual guest consumed more than 2.5 pounds of food , what is the minimum number of guests that could have attended the banquet ?
a 1 k . m . long wire is held by n poles . if one pole is removed , the length of the gap becomes 12 / 3 m . what is the number of poles initially ?
one side of the bottom layer of a triangular pyramid has 12 balls . how many are there in the whole pyramid ? note that the pyramid is equilateral and solid .
if the price of a book is first decreased by 30 % and then increased by 20 % , then the net change in the price will be :

in smithtown , the ratio of right - handed people to left - handed people is 3 to 1 and the ratio of men to women is 3 to 2 . if the number of right - handed men is maximized , then what s percent of all the people in smithtown are left - handed women ?
in a mixture of 45 litres the ratio of milk to water is 4 : 1 . additional 21 litres of water is added to the mixture . find the ratio of milk to water in the resulting mixture .
if jake loses 35 pounds , he will weigh thrice as much as his sister . together they now weigh 275 pounds . what is jake ' s present weight , in pounds ?
nd the area of trapezium whose parallel sides are 20 cm and 18 cm long , and the distance between them is 12 cm ?
express a speed of 342 kmph in meters per second ?
find 18 / 6 * 4
if the average ( arithmetic mean ) of 2 a + 16 , 3 a - 8 is 94 , what is the value of a ?

a particular library has 75 books in a special collection , all of which were in the library at the beginning of the month . these book are occasionally loaned out through an inter - library program . if , by the end of the month , 70 percent of books that were loaned out are returned and there are 63 books in the special collection at that time , how many books of the special collection were loaned out during that month ?
5 / 8 th of a job is completed in 10 days . if a person works at the same pace , how many days will he take to complete the job ?

one - sixth of the light switches produced by a certain factory are defective . 4 - fifths of the defective switches are rejected and 1 / 15 of the non defective switches are rejected by mistake . if all the switches not rejected are sold , what percent of the switches sold by the factory are defective ?
in a 300 member association consisting of men and women , exactly 20 % of men and exactly 25 % women are homeowners . what is the least number of members who are homeowners ?

a couple decides to have 4 children . if they succeed in having 4 children and each child is equally likely to be a boy or a girl , what is the probability that they will have exactly 2 girls and 2 boys ?
express a speed of 36 kmph in meters per second ?
a watch was sold at a loss of 10 % . if it was sold for rs . 500 more , there would have been a gain of 10 % . what is the cost price ?

the average ( arithmetic mean ) of 16 students first quiz scores in a difficult english class is 62.5 . when one student dropped the class , the average of the remaining scores increased to 63.0 . what is the quiz score of the student who dropped the class ?
a person lent a certain sum of money at 4 % per annum at simple interest and in 8 years the interest amounted to rs . 238 less than the sum lent . what was the sum lent ?
a sum of money lent out at s . i . amounts to rs . 850 after 2 years and to rs . 1020 after a further period of 5 years . the sum is ?
a train 200 m long running at 54 kmph crosses a platform in 25 sec . what is the length of the platform ?
in measuring the sides of a rectangle , one side is taken 6 % in excess , and the other 5 % in deficit . find the error percent in the area calculated from these measurements .
the milk level in a rectangular box measuring 60 feet by 25 feet is to be lowered by 6 inches . how many gallons of milk must be removed ? ( 1 cu ft = 7.5 gallons )
the top and bottom of a tower were seen to be at angles of depression 30 ° and 60 ° from the top of a hill of height 100 m . find the height of the tower
find the ratio in which rice at rs . 7.00 a kg be mixed with rice at rs . 5.70 a kg to produce a mixture worth rs . 6.30 a kg ?
what is the smallest number h which when increased by 5 is completely divisible by 8 , 11 and 24 ?

solution a is 20 % salt and solution b is 60 % salt . if you have 30 ounces of solution a and 60 ounces of solution b , in what ratio could you mix solution a with solution b to produce 50 ounces of a 50 % salt solution ?
a hall is 15 m long and 12 m broad . if the sum of the areas of the floor and the ceiling is equal to the sum of the areas of four walls , the volume of the hall is :
the sides of a triangle are in the ratio 5 : 12 : 13 and its perimeter is 420 m , its area is ?
